DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability AZD1656 multiple repeat oral dos Japanese patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: To Study Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics AZD1656 Japanese Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female nonchildbearing potential Japanese T2DM patient , 3075 year . A body mass index ( BMI ) 19 27 kg/m2 . Diagnosed Diabetes Mellitus patient treat diet exercise two oral antidiabetic drug . Stable glycemic control indicate change treatment within 3 month prior enrollment . Renal dysfunction GFR < 60 mL/min . Systolic pressure ( SBP ) > 160 mmHg diastolic pressure ( DBP ) > 95 mmHg Clinically significant illness clinically relevant trauma , judge investigator , within two week first administration IP . History ischemic heart disease , stroke , transient ischemic attack symptomatic peripheral vascular disease .
